info.name: Movie Booking Complete API Collection
info.description: A comprehensive collection of all API endpoints for the Movie Booking System

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Avengers: Endgame",
    "description": "After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.",
    "releaseDate": "2019-04-26",
    "duration": 181,
    "genres": ["Action", "Adventure", "Sci-Fi"],
    "director": "Anthony Russo, Joe Russo",
    "cast": ["Robert Downey Jr.", "Chris Evans", "Mark Ruffalo"],
    "rating": "PG-13",
    "posterUrl": "https://example.com/avengers-endgame.jpg",
    "trailerUrl": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcMBFSGVi1c"
}

body.raw:
{
    "name": "IMAX Theater",
    "capacity": 250,
    "type": "imax",
    "features": ["Reclining Seats", "Dolby Atmos", "Laser Projection"],
    "seatLayout": {
        "rows": 15,
        "columns": 20,
        "seats": [
            {
                "row": "A",
                "column": 1,
                "type": "standard",
                "price": 14.99,
                "isActive": true,
                "seatNumber": "A1"
            },
            {
                "row": "A",
                "column": 2,
                "type": "standard",
                "price": 14.99,
                "isActive": true,
                "seatNumber": "A2"
            },
            {
                "row": "B",
                "column": 1,
                "type": "premium",
                "price": 19.99,
                "isActive": true,
                "seatNumber": "B1"
            },
            {
                "row": "B",
                "column": 2,
                "type": "premium",
                "price": 19.99,
                "isActive": true,
                "seatNumber": "B2"
            }
        ]
    },
    "screenSize": "imax",
    "soundSystem": "dolby-atmos",

}

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Movie Premiere: Inception",
    "description": "Join us for the premiere of Christopher Nolan's Inception, featuring a Q&A session with the cast.",
    "category": "Premiere",
    "startDate": "2023-12-15T19:00:00Z",
    "endDate": "2023-12-15T23:00:00Z",
    "location": {
        "name": "AMC Empire 25",
        "address": "234 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036",
        "city": "New York",
        "state": "NY",
        "country": "USA",
        "coordinates": {
            "latitude": 40.7569,
            "longitude": -73.9896
        }
    },
    "image": "https://example.com/inception-premiere.jpg",
    "featuredImage": "https://example.com/inception-premiere-featured.jpg",
    "gallery": [
        "https://example.com/inception-premiere-1.jpg",
        "https://example.com/inception-premiere-2.jpg"
    ],
    "movieId": "{{movieId}}",
    "cinemaId": "{{cinemaId}}",
    "capacity": 200,
    "ticketPrice": 50,
    "isPublic": true,
    "isFeatured": true,
    "status": "scheduled",
    "tags": ["premiere", "q&a", "christopher nolan"],
    "guests": [
        {
            "name": "Leonardo DiCaprio",
            "role": "Actor"
        },
        {
            "name": "Christopher Nolan",
            "role": "Director"
        }
    ],
    "organizer": {
        "name": "Warner Bros. Pictures",
        "contact": "events@warnerbros.com",
        "website": "https://www.warnerbros.com"
    }
}

body.raw:
{ "title": "Marvel Announces New Avengers Movie", "content": "

Marvel Studios has announced a new Avengers movie set to release in 2025. The film will feature a new team of heroes following the events of Endgame.

Kevin Feige, president of Marvel Studios, stated that the new film will 'take the MCU in a bold new direction' and will introduce several new characters to the cinematic universe.

", "summary": "Marvel Studios announces a new Avengers movie set to release in 2025 with a new team of heroes.", "category": "Movie News", "author": { "name": "John Smith", "email": "john.smith@example.com", "bio": "Entertainment reporter with 10 years of experience covering Hollywood news." }, "publishDate": "2023-12-01T10:00:00Z", "image": "https://example.com/avengers-news.jpg", "featuredImage": "https://example.com/avengers-news-featured.jpg", "gallery": [ "https://example.com/avengers-news-1.jpg", "https://example.com/avengers-news-2.jpg" ], "tags": ["marvel", "avengers", "mcu", "upcoming movies"], "relatedMovies": ["{{movieId}}"], "isFeatured": true, "status": "published", "source": { "name": "Marvel Studios", "url": "https://www.marvel.com/news" } }

request.description: Create a new news article (admin only)

body.raw:
{ "title": "Marvel Announces New Avengers Movie: Heroes Reborn", "content": "

Marvel Studios has announced a new Avengers movie titled 'Heroes Reborn' set to release in 2025. The film will feature a new team of heroes following the events of Endgame.

Kevin Feige, president of Marvel Studios, stated that the new film will 'take the MCU in a bold new direction' and will introduce several new characters to the cinematic universe.

Production is set to begin in early 2024 with a star-studded cast that will be announced in the coming months.

", "summary": "Marvel Studios announces a new Avengers movie titled 'Heroes Reborn' set to release in 2025 with a new team of heroes.", "tags": ["marvel", "avengers", "mcu", "upcoming movies", "heroes reborn"], "isFeatured": true, "status": "published" }

item.name: Reviews
item.description: API endpoints for movie reviews and ratings

Get a specific review by ID
Get all reviews by the current user

body.raw:

    "movieId": "{{movieId}}",

    "title": "Great movie!",
    "content": "This was an excellent film with great performances and an engaging story.",
    "tags": ["action", "entertaining"]
}
